languages.text: The character's WS and BS are decreased in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.

traits.locale_text: The character's WS and BS are decreased in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.

languages.text: Reduces the character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} персонажа в следующем бою будут уменьшены. Это однократный штраф, который исчезнет по завершении боя.

languages.text: Bir sonraki çatışmada karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} niteliklerini azaltır. Bu ceza puanı tek seferliktir ve çatışma bitince ortadan kalkar.

traits.locale_text: Bir sonraki çatışmada karakterin Silah Yeteneği ve Balistik Yetenek niteliklerini azaltır. Bu ceza puanı tek seferliktir ve çatışma bitince ortadan kalkar.

languages.text: Reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} del personaje en el siguiente combate. Esta es una penalización única que desaparece al terminar el combate.

languages.text: 在下一场战斗中，此角色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}降低。此减值效果为一次性效果，会在战斗结束之后消失。
languages.original_text: Reduces the character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.

traits.locale_text: 在下一场战斗中，此角色的武器技能与弹道技能降低。此减值效果为一次性效果，会在战斗结束之后消失。

languages.text: Réduit la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} du personnage lors du prochain combat. Cette pénalité unique disparaît à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Reduces the character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.

languages.text: 次の戦闘でキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}が低下する。これは1回限定ペナルティで、戦闘終了後に消える。

traits.locale_text: 次の戦闘でキャラクターの武器スキルと弾道スキルが低下する。これは1回限定ペナルティで、戦闘終了後に消える。
